column2: b'Chiisana Koi no Monogatari: Chichi to Sally Hatsukoi no Shiki'

b'Tiny schoolgirl Chiiko develops a crush on older boy Sally and believes herself to be his girlfriend, although Sally is already involved in a love triangle with a girl called Tonko.\n\n(Source: The Anime Encyclopedia)'
